title: 491 35 "Landing at the Maiden Island! The Harsh Reality Falls Upon Luffy!"Transliteration: "Nyōgashima Jōriku – Rufi o Semeru Kakoku na Genjitsu" (Japanese:女ヶ島上陸 ルフィを責める過酷な現実) Directed by: Makoto SonodaStoryboarded by: Eisaku Inoue Yoshiyuki Suga March 27, 2011(2011-03-27)[240]
